text: Body of My Enemy () is a 1976 French crime movie directed by Henri Verneuil and starring Jean-Paul Belmondo, Bernard Blier, Marie-France Pisier, François Perrot, Daniel Ivernel, Claude Brosset, Yvonne Gaudeau, René Lefèvre, Michel Beaune, Nicole Garcia, Élisabeth Margoni. == Other websites == * * Category:1976 crime movies Category:French crime movies Category:Movies directed by Henri Verneuil
title: Body of My Enemy
